title: Right Wrong Top Free Word Game
creator: Dev IT Solutions Pvt. Ltd.

extendedInfo.description: Right Wrong is an amazing Educational Gaming App for Android. This app is designed and developed for kids & Adults to learn English words with lot of fun and excitement.This amazing app was developed by expert and experienced developers, is the best and easiest way to learn correct spellings of English Words. This app teaches spellings of thousands of English words.The App shows a word and the user needs to identify whether or not it is the correct spelling for that word. User just needs to tap on either of the 2 options given at the bottom of the screen i.e., Right Or Wrong?Once the user taps Right Or Wrong for all words displayed in a level, they will be then showed the number of correct and incorrect answers with the correct spellings of all words. The App also allows the user to share scores on Facebook and Twitter to show the ability and sharpness to friends & family. So to conclude this is one of the finest Apps available for Android, to learn spellings of thousands of English words.Features List:1	Attractive User Interface2	Multiple Game Modes (Easy, Medium & Hard)3	Improves Spelling Quotient4	Enhances Mindâs Competence5	Helps Learn Thousands of English Words6	Increases English Vocabulary & Word Power7	Highly Engaging8	User Friendly

reviews.title: Excellent App To Learn Spellings Of English Words
reviews.comment: This is one of a kind app which can help kids & adults to identify between correct & incorrect spellings of English Words.  I have never seen any other app like this one to learn the difference between Right & Wrong spellings. It is so good and entertaining that my kid keeps playing it for hours at a time.  GREAT APP!!!!!!  Thanks,
reviews.author: Parth Dalal

reviews.title: Excellent application
reviews.comment: This app is extremely useful for me to learn english words.
reviews.author: shreyans patel
